hero.title: Advantages of Happytel
hero.subtitle: Share wireless mobile internet via eSIM with other mobile devices easily and quickly
hero.card2_text: Personal, work and travel plan — all in one smartphone. Easy to switch in a couple of clicks
hero.card3_text: Don’t waste your nerves talking to various bots or AI. Trust the professionals — our team will solve any connection issues instantly!
hero.card4_text: eSIM cannot be lost or damaged. If you lose your phone, the number can be easily transferred to another device
hero.card5_text: Large data packages at an affordable price. No hidden fees, overpayments or imposed services
hero.card6_text: No plastic SIM cards — less waste and care for the environment
